portfolio.title: LoanFlow
portfolio.description: At PNC Bank, I contributed to the Loan Management platform, designed to streamline the entire loan lifecycle from application processing to repayment tracking. The system automated loan approvals, interest calculations, and payment scheduling while providing real-time updates on loan statuses. It aimed to enhance efficiency, reduce manual errors, and improve the customer experience.

portfolio.title: FiTrack
portfolio.description: Developed a financial tracking system designed to streamline the monitoring and management of income, expenses, and budgets. The system provided real-time insights into financial transactions, enabling users to generate detailed reports and forecasts for better decision-making. It aimed to enhance financial transparency, accuracy, and efficiency for individuals or organizations.

portfolio.title: HealthCare Platform
portfolio.description: Designed and developed an intelligent application focused on optimizing the allocation, utilization, and tracking of hospital resources such as staff, equipment, and supplies. The innovative solution streamlined resource management, ensuring efficient operations and improved productivity. It provided real-time monitoring and data-driven insights to enhance decision-making in healthcare facilities
